intro: Hello, I'm João, a Software and AI Engineer based in the USA 🇺🇸
paragraphs: I'm a tech entusiast and a lifelong learner, always looking to keep up with the latest technologies.
When I'm not working you're likely find me on the beach. I cherish family time and have a soft spot for four-legged friends 🐕.

workingGeniuses.name: Wonder
workingGeniuses.description: The natural gift of pondering the possibility of greater potential and opportunity in a given situation.

workingGeniuses.name: Discernment
workingGeniuses.description: The natural gift of intuitively and instinctively evaluating ideas and situations.
